scripts.build:old: pnpm run clean && cross-env BASE_PATH=/astro-blog/ astro build
scripts.build: pnpm run clean && astro build --out-dir docs
scripts.gh:preview: pnpm run build && pnpm run preview
scripts.gh:deploy: pnpm run build && git diff --quiet docs || (git add docs && git commit -m "build: deploy" && git push)
